Message.Title: Good Morning Fellow Ebayers
Message.Msg: The failed watch seller still lurks in the shadows looking for long lost friends who are no longer with us. On the brite side Ebay can be found right where's it's been for 17 years and I'm not going anywhere either Long Live Ebay and it's followers ~ LOL

Charlie is all alone now (help to him, Midlife?) with his multiple identities while the rest of us forge new frontiers in our lives. Best wishes to you, SEB and all the other well-meaning people who have populated this board present and past.

Failed? Are you still obsessed daily with a man from 2005 that outed your ebay selling lies and showed the world that you would sacrifice your family (especially your daughter and grand child) to live on a third rate chat board of a 5th rate stock 247 every day for 12 years? Really? That's your story and it's someone else's fault? ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Sully

Really Flything? is your way of "forging a new frontier in your lives" commiserating again publicly with your failed old boyfriend board troll over a man who cuckholded you figuratively and literally? I'm glad I don't sully my mind with such public g@yness. Don't you have tax beans to count? ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Sully

Message.Title: I Look Down From Heaven At The Two Obsessed And Trapped Board Trolls John And Flyktning.
Message.Msg: I love being in heaven but don't want to 'harp' on it. All day in comfort, ease, and high minded pursuits, it's so much like being a tenured professor. Is that yellow moisture on the end of my Golden Staff or am I just happy to see John and Fly still obsessing in their endless endless endless circles? I hope that helps.
